subject: Which pedals are called UT-P3
description_text:
Hello,
We have ordered from Aliexpress for long Time ago and we havent recieved the order yet. Now they say that the only pedals there is to order is Simsonn UT-P3. Which model is that??
Not a happy customer.

Regards
Fredrik Johansson 
Skickat från min iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Fredrik Johansson,  Hello, our SIMSONN lineup includes the PlusX and ProX Ultra pedals. Here is the link for your reference. These pedals feature real hydraulic rods and an upgraded damping system, and support vibration feedback motors. You can purchase them directly from our official website.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pro-plus-x-pedals     https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-sim-pedal-pro-x-ultra
